query:
UPDATE releases SET isLatest = 0 WHERE isLatest = 1;

INSERT INTO releases (version, title, changelog, fileSizeMb, isLatest, isPrerelease, publishedAt, createdAt)
VALUES (
  '2.0.0',
  'Archibald Titan v2.0 — Watchdog, Bulk Sync & History',
  '**Credential Expiry Watchdog**
- Set expiration dates on stored API keys and credentials
- Configurable alert thresholds (3, 7, 14, or 30 days before expiry)
- Dashboard summary with active, expiring, and expired credential counts
- Dismiss or remove watches at any time
- Prevent production outages from expired credentials

**Bulk Provider Sync**
- One-click re-fetch across all previously configured providers
- Real-time progress tracking with per-provider status
- Cancel running sync jobs at any time
- Full sync history with success/failure breakdown
- Supports manual and scheduled sync triggers

**Credential Diff & History**
- Automatic version tracking every time a credential is fetched or rotated
- Visual timeline showing created, rotated, manual update, and rollback events
- Add snapshot notes to document why credentials were changed
- One-click rollback to any previous credential value
- 30-day change summary with breakdown by change type
- Filter history by individual credential

**Other Improvements**
- Removed refund policy references from FAQ and contact form
- Updated How It Works section to correctly describe the Fetcher assistant
- 3 new database tables for watchdog, sync, and history tracking
- 15 new automated tests covering all v2.0 features
- Total test count now at 223 passing tests',
  195,
  1,
  0,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2BuYCT9gQQ4yTNK.ca8f147b4c0c --database F68pUR9acQYwkEa4pLPrRs --execute UPDATE releases SET isLatest = 0 WHERE isLatest = 1;

INSERT INTO releases (version, title, changelog, fileSizeMb, isLatest, isPrerelease, publishedAt, createdAt)
VALUES (
  '2.0.0',
  'Archibald Titan v2.0 — Watchdog, Bulk Sync & History',
  '**Credential Expiry Watchdog**
- Set expiration dates on stored API keys and credentials
- Configurable alert thresholds (3, 7, 14, or 30 days before expiry)

- Dismiss or remove watches at any time
- Prevent production outages from expired credentials

- Cancel running sync jobs at any time
- Full sync history with success/failure breakdown
- Supports manual and scheduled sync triggers

- Visual timeline showing created, rotated, manual update, and rollback events

- One-click rollback to any previous credential value
- 30-day change summary with breakdown by change type
- Filter history by individual credential

**Other Improvements**
- Removed refund policy references from FAQ and contact form
- Updated How It Works section to correctly describe the Fetcher assistant
- 3 new database tables for watchdog, sync, and history tracking
- 15 new automated tests covering all v2.0 features

  195,

  0,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);
